channel.title: Home on Vedant Mhatre
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Vedant Mhatre

item.title: Cloudflare's Insightful Bytes
item.description: Whenever I find myself surfing the web and craving some deep technical insights, Cloudflare’s blog is my go-to spot. There’s just something about the way they handle topics, from the simple to the complex, that keeps me coming back for more. You know how sometimes we, software engineers, have this itch? The itch to understand the mechanics of a system, the nuances of a protocol, or simply the ‘why’ behind a certain technology?

item.title: About
item.description: A software engineer who wants to solve real-world problems using technology. Currently, working at Hiver. Started my journey in 2014 by experimenting with Linux and Android. Over the next few years explored various domains like cyber security, backend engineering, and DevOps. Currently focusing on backend engineering and DevOps. Contact me Linkedin GitHub Twitter

item.title: Bookshelf
item.description: I like to read books in my free time here are some of them that I recommend. Zero to One The Hard Thing about Hard Things Man’s Search For Meaning The Stranger The Bed of Procrustes The Almanack Of Naval Ravikant The Psychology Of Money Never Split the Difference How to Win Friends and Influence People The Richest Man In Babylon
